tags: droney is so loved right now
summary:
MJ: [Walks in to see Peter facing the window]
Peter: You don’t know how much I love you...I got this outfit just for you to show...
body:
MJ: [Walks in to see Peter facing the window]

Peter: You don’t know how much I love you…I got this outfit just for you to show how much you mean to me. I only give the best to my sweetest! Happy Valentine’s Day! You deserve so much more.

MJ: [blushes] Peter…

Peter: [turns around to show Spider-Drone in his hands wearing a sweater] Oh, hey MJ!

reblog.comment:
MJ: [Walks in to see Peter facing the window]

Peter: You don’t know how much I love you…I got this outfit just for you to show how much you mean to me. I only give the best to my sweetest! Happy Valentine’s Day! You deserve so much more.

MJ: [blushes] Peter…

Peter: [turns around to show Spider-Drone in his hands wearing a sweater] Oh, hey MJ!

Peter Porker aka Spider-Ham from Spider Man Into the Spider-Verse!

blog.name: haelfrost
blog.title: The King and his Sorcerer
blog.description: "How can you find me attractive? I hate people and sarcasm is my only defence."

title: “Peter… relax.”
body:
Author: haelfrost

Summary: Imagine you find out that Flash has been making fun of Peter because he doesn’t believe him about the whole Spider-Man situation, so you decide to help him out by giving him a little “present” to make Flash jealous… I don’t know… that’s a really bad description, it made more sense in my head. But you get the idea… I hope. Oh and before I forget, the reader in this is Jessica Drew (Spider-Woman)… just thought it’ll be kinda cool!

Main character(s): Peter Parker

Notes: Nothing weird going on! Just a sweet little kiss on the cheek between friends and the reader is just a couple of years older than Peter… hopefully that’s not weird. I wanted it to be as innocent as possible it was just a random little thing I thought of at like 3am the other night. FYI Tom Holland is adorable and I love him… in a non weird way lol

“Well, then… why don’t we give them something to be envious about?” You suggest after noticing the look of sadness in Peter’s deep, brown eyes.

“Wh- like… like what?” Stutters Peter.

“Oh, I dunno… like… something?” There’s a mischievous glint in your eyes as the hint of smile plays on your lips. Peter is still staring at you with his usual adorable confusion. “Come here.” You say in a quiet voice. He just raises his eyebrows with a quizzical expression. “Come here!” You say with a quiet laugh. He finally manages to make his way over to where you’re standing. “Okay, now… close your eyes.”

“What?” Peter asks, eyes wide with trepidation.

“Peter.” You say with a quiet giggle. “Trust me… please.” You add with a little smile. “I’m not going to hurt you or anything, I promise.” Peter keeps looking at you with the same anxious look in his eyes before finally taking a deep and letting out an unsteady sigh.

“O-okay.” He manages to stutter before hesitantly closing his eyes. “You know, I’m not scared… I mean, I don’t know. Scared probably isn’t the right word… uh… I mean… nervous! Like… nervous… I’m not nervous or anything and I know you’re not going to do anything bad but…” Peter begins to ramble on as a little giggle escapes your lips.

“Peter, relax.” You cut him off.

“Mhm.” He mumbles, nodding his head. You gently place a soft, sweet kiss on his cheek before you hear a quiet sigh escape his lips.

“Oh.” He sighs quietly. “Uh…” He opens his eyes and looks at you with a nervous smile.

“You’re a sweetheart, Peter… always remember that.” You whisper before taking a step back. “See? Now that wasn’t so bad, was it?” You ask with a giggle. “I bet your buddy Flash is going to be pretty jealous now… not only do you “know” Spider-Man but you’ve also got a kiss from Spider-Woman.” You’re playful wink elicits a laugh from Peter.

blog.name: baomien
blog.title: the protector and king of chilladelphia

tags: these take so long.. but theyre so fun..
summary: Teru and Miles for the ask game?
question: Teru and Miles for the ask game?
answer:
OH MAN…YOUVE PUT SO MUCH POWER IN MY LITTLE HANDS.. 

for teru: 

favorite thing about them: that he’s like. genuinely trying to be a good person, but he’s so convinced that he’s like achieved Peak Goodness that he just walks up to some stranger on the street (ritsu) and tries to give him the lecture on How To Be a Good Person. like he’s become so humble but still maintained his attitude?? he’s just so funny

least favorite thing about them: i can’t think of anything like bad but he did set a man on fire, watched him burn to death, and was just sorta cool with it???

favorite line: “you are breaking the rules. you remind me of my old self, and it hurts me to watch you.” 

brOTP: teru/mob, i think tsubomi/teru would be the Peak of pretty, popular, and uncaring, and of course ritsu/teru,

OTP: terumob again, i’ve gotten into teruritsu recently because..two previously on top of the world students suddenly find themselves ultimately changed!! parallels!! two unnecessarily antagonistic dudes that are almost polar opposites!! Angery

nOTP: I SAW A REALLY BAD POST ONCE WITH TERU/REIGEN..IF ANYONE COMES AT ME WITH THAT I’M ABOUT TO START SWINGING..

random headcanon: teru is part of the teddyfresh gang. also he can solve a rubix cube behind his back 

unpopular opinion: despite appearances, i do think his new carefree, bouncy attitude is a thinly veiled shield for old teru. not to say he’s not a good person, but his morals are defo skewed. he isn’t a perfect person!! 

song i associate with them: campus fashion by tipling rock, cellophane by emily blue, fake nice by the aces 

favorite picture of them: 

for miles: 

favorite thing about them: he’s so aware of who he is as a second gen hero living up to an iconic figure..and yet he’s made being spider-man something very personal and unique to himself!! plus, he’s so genuinely vulnerable and emotional in a way that a lot of heroes aren’t

least favorite thing about them: IK IT’S NOT HIS FAULT…BUT THE WAY HE KEPT BRUSHING OFF SAM IN CHAMPIONS #1 (2019) MADE ME REALLY UPSET!! 

favorite line: “how much of spider-man is pain. spider-man is your pain.” (spider-men vol 2) 

brOTP: kamala/sam/miles, miles/ ganke, the golden trio broken up into their cores, miles/america chaves, and miles/peter

OTP: kamala/sam/miles and it’s essentail parts and ganke/miles

nOTP: MILES/PETER!!! NO!!!!

random headcanon: miles draws all of his past fights in his sketchbook  

unpopular opinion: miles should add that dnd spider cloak to is spider-suit..not unpopular just under-appreciated 

song i associate with them: go for it by cruisr and why can’t we be friends? by the academic 

favorite picture of them:

favorite line: “you are breaking the rules. you remind me of my old self, and it hurts me to watch you.” 

brOTP: teru/mob, i think tsubomi/teru would be the Peak of pretty, popular, and uncaring, and of course ritsu/teru,

OTP: terumob again, i’ve gotten into teruritsu recently because..two previously on top of the world students suddenly find themselves ultimately changed!! parallels!! two unnecessarily antagonistic dudes that are almost polar opposites!! Angery

nOTP: I SAW A REALLY BAD POST ONCE WITH TERU/REIGEN..IF ANYONE COMES AT ME WITH THAT I’M ABOUT TO START SWINGING..

random headcanon: teru is part of the teddyfresh gang. also he can solve a rubix cube behind his back 

unpopular opinion: despite appearances, i do think his new carefree, bouncy attitude is a thinly veiled shield for old teru. not to say he’s not a good person, but his morals are defo skewed. he isn’t a perfect person!! 

song i associate with them: campus fashion by tipling rock, cellophane by emily blue, fake nice by the aces 

favorite picture of them: 

for miles: 

favorite thing about them: he’s so aware of who he is as a second gen hero living up to an iconic figure..and yet he’s made being spider-man something very personal and unique to himself!! plus, he’s so genuinely vulnerable and emotional in a way that a lot of heroes aren’t

least favorite thing about them: IK IT’S NOT HIS FAULT…BUT THE WAY HE KEPT BRUSHING OFF SAM IN CHAMPIONS #1 (2019) MADE ME REALLY UPSET!! 

favorite line: “how much of spider-man is pain. spider-man is your pain.” (spider-men vol 2) 

brOTP: kamala/sam/miles, miles/ ganke, the golden trio broken up into their cores, miles/america chaves, and miles/peter

OTP: kamala/sam/miles and it’s essentail parts and ganke/miles

nOTP: MILES/PETER!!! NO!!!!

random headcanon: miles draws all of his past fights in his sketchbook  

unpopular opinion: miles should add that dnd spider cloak to is spider-suit..not unpopular just under-appreciated 

song i associate with them: go for it by cruisr and why can’t we be friends? by the academic 

favorite picture of them:

trail.content_raw:
OH MAN…YOUVE PUT SO MUCH POWER IN MY LITTLE HANDS.. 

for teru: 

favorite thing about them: that he’s like. genuinely trying to be a good person, but he’s so convinced that he’s like achieved Peak Goodness that he just walks up to some stranger on the street (ritsu) and tries to give him the lecture on How To Be a Good Person. like he’s become so humble but still maintained his attitude?? he’s just so funny

least favorite thing about them: i can’t think of anything like bad but he did set a man on fire, watched him burn to death, and was just sorta cool with it???

favorite line: “you are breaking the rules. you remind me of my old self, and it hurts me to watch you.”
